scenario_text.value:
That guy...Kaito? He’s a friend, right?
Doesn’t that make the woman our enemy?

Isn’t it? I think you’re all overthinking
this.

An enemy to one of us is an enemy of all of
us! Isn’t that all you need to know?
Oh, hey, that actually sounds pretty deep.

There’s nothing deep about it. That’s just
a paranoid mindset.

Still, something tells me we shouldn’t trust
that woman!
